attributes.action: Return of stolen children by UK goverment to their mothers by December 10th 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We mother of England and Wales with the coalition of victims of the UK'sCourts, allies and supporters demand to the Prime Minister to re-evaluate and send back home to their mothers the vast amount of children put in care by the corrupted courts here in teh UK.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
